scripts.build: npm run html:build && npm run js:build && npm run data:build && npm run css:build
scripts.data:build: mkdir -p dist/resources && cp -rf resources/data resources/img dist/resources/
scripts.js:build: mkdir -p dist/resources && babel resources/js --out-dir dist/resources/js && cp -rf resources/vendor dist/resources/ && cp node_modules/jquery-ui-touch-punch/jquery.ui.touch-punch.min.js dist/resources/js && cp node_modules/nouislider/distribute/nouislider.min.js  dist/resources/js
scripts.html:pages: echo "index location local-climate-charts historical-weather-data high-tide-flooding local-climate-maps national-climate-maps stations variables error faq definitions credits about 404 cards-home"
scripts.html:build: mkdir -p dist; bundlebars --compile --data config.yml --partials template --partialExt -o dist/ ./*.hbs; htmlpages=$(npm run html:pages --silent); for f in $htmlpages; do echo $f && mv dist/$f.hbs dist/$f.html && mkdir -p dist/${f} && cp -f dist/${f}.html dist/${f}/index.html; done;
scripts.css:build: node-sass -o resources/css/ resources/scss/screen.scss --include-path node_modules/compass-mixins/lib/ --output-style expanded --source-comments && mkdir -p dist/resources && cp -rf resources/fonts resources/css dist/resources/ && cp node_modules/nouislider/distribute/nouislider.min.css  dist/resources/css
scripts.deploy:fli: aws s3 sync --delete --no-follow-symlinks dist/ s3://climate-explorer/ &&  aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E34SU5ZJ0O3LC0 --paths '/*'
scripts.deploy:nemac: aws s3 sync --delete --no-follow-symlinks dist/ s3://climateexplorer2.nemac.org/ &&  aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1Q1S8U8911R6D --paths '/*'
